name: Nextflow Development Environment
postCreateCommand: sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y openjdk-11-jdk curl && curl -s https://get.nextflow.io | bash && chmod +x nextflow && sudo mv nextflow /usr/local/bin/ && sudo apt-get install -y docker.io && sudo groupadd docker || true && sudo usermod -aG docker $(whoami) && sudo chown $(whoami):docker /var/run/docker.sock
